thread.section_title: Lendio Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lendio | www.lendio.com
thread.title: Doug Geib

author: Doug Geib
title: Doug Geib
text:
Great experience! Meghan Finning was assigned to me and what a refreshing experience. She was very professional and knowledgable. She always updated me with the status of my loan and would answer my phone calls or call me back shortly after. She told me exactly what she needed to get my loan approved and she handled everything else to make sure it happened. Thanks Meghan :)
DG Homes, LLC
